page.title: 03Community Activities
page.content: Shawfield School caters for all age ranges in its community-based activities. There is a playgroup every morning and a mother and toddlers' group twice a week in the afternoons to cater for the youngest members of our community. At lunchtime twice a week the senior citizens come to Luncheon Club. In the evenings and at weekends there is a range of clubs for all ages, and there are often events for handicapped people. In all these activities the pupils of Shawfield play a very active part, both assisting others and participating themselves.
